experiencedEngineersSection.title: For Experienced Engineers, By an Experienced Engineer
experiencedEngineersSection.content:
Every RAG tutorial fails you the same way:
- Toy examples with 5 documents that don't scale
- PhD theory about transformers you don't need  
- 40-hour courses when you have deadlines

You're already an engineer. You just need the patterns and working code.

This is what I built after 13 years at Cloudflare, Gruntwork, and Pinecone. Not on the AI hype train - just engineering that works.
